reviews.review:
一款载入史册的游戏，很难想象这款我在steam买的第二款游戏，会有如此低廉的价格，也许这就是早买早享受，不买G胖送。
总之，技巧和情节我全都要的神作，顺带还复习了中学时代最讨厌的物理基础知识。
第一次玩还是不要看攻略了，钻研半天过关有如数学解题般的快感它不香吗？
新手入门建议：找墙面，找高度差，找斜坡，没事多射射~

Excellent graphics and usage of engine (despite age of title).
Excellent cooperative puzzle game play.
Extremely fun and builds critical thinking and communication skills.
Nunca mais vou olhar pra uma batata do mesmo jeito.
its fun and it works out your brain
Игра очень прикольная, я прохожу её вместе с другом, пока ещё не прошёл но очень нравится.
Polecam, bardzo dobra gra :) Nie zestarzała się mocno :)
Not only is it fun, it's hilarious.   Well worth playing!

I honestly cannot think of anything negative to say about this game, other than its short length. This game is an absolute masterpiece. It is a shame games are not made like this anymore. Best 10 bucks I've ever spent.
epic lore and creeativity also nice workshop and coop
good game some bugs but that makes it fun

bom
bom jogo
muito bom
jogasso viu
top
I like how funny Wheatley is throughout the story
花了7个小时，没查攻略还没通，通了再更
Did the story mode in coop with a buddy was really fun and mind boggling at the same time

This review is kinda redundant, considering the fact that this is one of the best games ever created. Literally. Why are you even reading Portal 2 reviews, you probably already know it's a good game. Why?
Great puzzles, and storyline one of the best endings I've seen to a game
O jogo é bom e não é tão pesado quanto parece se você souber mexer nas configurações do jogo.
O único problema é o bug com os gestures que fez eu ter que pegar um controle extra capenga e ligar ele só pra conseguir terminar o jogo com a minha namorada. Mas de resto tá show!
best dollar ive ever spent very good
Super nápady a příběh je taky zajímavější oproti jedničce..
Better than I thought it would be
This game is a masterpiece and if you havent played it yet you better get at it 10/10 would play again
que delicia cara jogos muito top d+++ :v
The game play to this day is amazing and truly stood the test of time. But if anything the co-op is the best if you play with someone you know
This is one of my absolute favorite steam puzzle games! The story-line is fun and engaging and the levels are challenging and fun

Игра меня сразу увлекла с самого начала. Честно я не ожидал особого сюжета, думал просто головоломки, но чем больше играешь тем интересней. Поэтому это игра заслуживает чтобы в нее поиграли все. Она лучшая игра в которую я играл! Советую всем!!

super, zwlaszcza w swiatecznej promocji gdzie za niecale 6 zl masz dwie gierki na zajecie czasu super. tryb fabularny solo nie jest az tak trudny jak niektore pomieszczenia w trybie coop, ale tak czy siak robi czlowiekowi myslenie i czas szybko przy niej leci, polecam, to chyba najlepiej wydane przeze mnie ostatnio pieniadze
it is a good puzzle  game
I got this game originally on the xbox 360 back in the early 2010s and now when 2019 is coming to a close i still love playing it.
great game to co-op with friends or to build relationships / synergy with another person
Jogo muito bom, pode acreditar lhe rendera muita diversão no modo historia, e, ainda há o modo co-op que acredito ser melhor ainda (não joguei o co-op)
ÓTIMO JOGO, jogabilidade legal, graficos bonitos, ótimo co-op, é muito bom pra esforçar o cerebro recomendo
难度设置、玩法新颖、趣味性各方面都没有缺点，尚可的剧情，诚意十足的价格。很难给出一个不买的理由
One of the best puzzle games with great characters.
One of the best games I've ever played. True masterpiece and a refinement to the first Portal game
Uno de los mejores juegos que alguna vez han sido hechos.
КОСМОС!!! КОСМОС!!! Я В КОСМОСЕ!!! Я В КОСМОСЕ!!! КОСМОС!!! Я В КОСМОСЕ!
it gets you dizzy, story gets weird, you need a brain, but its a super great coop game
1/3 do meu cérebro derreteu, mas valeu a pena
I love this game because it is hilarious like the first Portal and it has cool puzzles that I have never in seen in other games.
I think GladOS is the same character as Caroline. Just a theory but I'm not certain.
I hate puzzle games but this game was still so good.
One of the best games ever!
Love the puzzles and the story.  Still a classic every time I replay it.
compelling story, enjoyable characters, amazing physics and graphics on my older macbook air
Довольно круто, особенно когда играешь с др

So nostalgic, so good...just buy it, take your time and enjoy it!
Believe me, after the game, you will be still alive!
This game is amazing and very fast I love it Buy now.
